availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Milwaukee, Wisconsin, attorney. New York native. Married to Adelaid Hickcox. Father of Katherine "Kate" H. Hickcox and Edward Hickcox. Attorney in Milwaukee in 1860. Candidate for the clerkship of the Milwaukee Circuit Court in 1864. Member of the Democratic Party.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Wisconsin, Milwaukee County, Milwaukee, Ward 1, p. 46.; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Wisconsin, Milwaukee County, Milwaukee, Ward 1, p. 109; "Democratic County Ticket," The Daily Milwaukee News (Milwaukee, Wis.), October 2, 1864, p. 5.
